articles.author: Liudas Dapkus
articles.title: US armored vehicle missing in Lithuania pulled from swamp but fate of 4 soldiers is still unknown - The Associated Press
articles.description: Lithuanian officials say a U.S. armored vehicle that went missing during a training exercise has been retrieved from a swamp after a six-day search but there is still no information about the fate of the four American soldiers who were on board. The Lithuania…
articles.content: VILNIUS, Lithuania (AP) A U.S. armored vehicle that went missing in Lithuania has been retrieved from a swamp after a six-day search but there is still no information about the fate of the four Ameri… [+1569 chars]
